name: Someone Special
description:
*Please play in full-screen!*

Someone Special is an interactive fiction piece. With the help of his neighbors, Emitt, the mouse, is looking for somebody special. There are over 10 unique endings based on your choices over the course of a few days. Try and find all the endings!

Special thanks to Emitt Rhodes for inspiration, Cole Bucciaglia for feedback, and my friends who playtested.
